img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 56.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/60/Wukong_Pagoda_56.jpg)
However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight.
img_below_text:
Further up the cell tunnel, you may notice a Snake-Head Mushroom glowing blue... that can't be right. Try to harvest it, and you'll uncover an extremely strong Fungiman enemy.
![Wukong Pagoda 59.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/80/Wukong_Pagoda_59.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 54 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 56.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/60/Wukong_Pagoda_56.jpg)
However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight."
            - Following Text: "Further up the cell tunnel, you may notice a Snake-Head Mushroom glowing blue... that can't be right. Try to harvest it, and you'll uncover an extremely strong Fungiman enemy.
![Wukong Pagoda 59.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/80/Wukong_Pagoda_59.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character wielding a glowing staff in a dimly lit, rocky tunnel. The character is approaching a cluster of glowing mushrooms, which are likely the Snake-Head Mushrooms mentioned in the context. The preceding text describes an encounter with a Red-Haired Yaksha and a green Wisp, while the following text warns of a strong Fungiman enemy that appears when attempting to harvest the glowing mushrooms. The image serves to illustrate the in-game environment and the challenges players will face in this section of the walkthrough.
